title: [1.8][ssp/smp]Flowercraft --花的世界，很大很大的花，多美啊
author: Ben_Jian
txt_content:
本帖最后由 Ben_Jian 于 2015-11-15 11:06 编辑 
这个MOD添加了一个花的群落，各种各样花的物品


如图，各种各样的花


图房。。。。。









怎么样，很美吧



作者原文
。
You need at least Recommended Forge for 1.8 hereIf you already have a version for 1.8. Please delete the config file .. 
You can find it here (Win-Button + R) (%appdata%/.minecraft/config) 

Last News: 

Update to 1.8 
New Blocks: 
HedgeWall, HedgeThornWall, HedgeThorn, PetalWall, RubberBlock (with jump), FlowerPot, HayBlock (with Slab and Stair), 
New Items: 
Dry Plant, Straw, Rubber 
New Armor: 
RubberHelmet, RubberChestplate, RubberLeggins, RubberBoots (with Jump) 


The MOD adds 15 new Flowers.blackrose, pansy_gray, pansy_brown, bluebell, iris, gardenia, blowball, thistle, enzian, orchid, foxgloves, lily, peony, redrose, chrysantheme. 
Biome "Phantasia" with BigFlower 
25 BigFlower "All Flower of this Mod and the Vanilla-Flowers" 

own Bonemeal (to the create the BigFlowers) 
Magicwand (to spawn for only Flower without Tallgrass) 10 applications per Rod 

Food HoneyPotion : Enchantment moveSpeed and jump (60Sec.) blindness (20Sec) 
Food HoneyBread : Enchantment poison (10 Sec) moveSpeed (30Sec) 
Food HoneyRaw: Enchantment confusion (10Sec) moveSpeed (15Sec) 

And a many new Blocks 





还有各种各样的食品啊




下载地址
http://download1587.mediafire.com/jnoj0ygbo35g/paxkfajr6ae7pih/Flowercraftmod-V2.02_MC1.8.jar



完结撒花       END
勿做伸手党

replies.author: fb0755
replies.txt_content: 就是一个美化功能的模组
我看到第一幅图时还以为这些花都是很大的。。{:10_492:}

replies.author: 卡辛
replies.txt_content: 第一张图看了以为花很大，结果只是加了特效。。{:10_492:}

replies.author: Ben_Jian
replies.txt_content: 花很大的，当然小的也有

replies.author: 鞍山地区
replies.txt_content: 亲，下载地址出错咯，请尽快修复~

replies.author: 鞍山地区
replies.txt_content: 建议楼主吧下载链接改成网盘或者附件，因为这个链接需要翻墙才能下载
